  • titan_pylib.graph.warshall_floyd

titan_pylib.graph.warshall_floyd のソースコード

 1from typing import List, Tuple, Union
 2
 3'''Return min dist s.t. dist[a][b] -> a to b. / O(|n|^3)'''
 4def warshall_floyd(G: List[List[Tuple[int, int]]], INF: Union[int, float]=float('inf')) -> List[List[Union[int, float]]]:
 5  n = len(G)
 6  dist = [[INF]*n for _ in range(n)]
 7  for v in range(n):
 8    dist_v_ = dist[v]
 9    for x, c in G[v]:
10      dist_v_[x] = c
11    dist_v_[v] = 0
12  for k in range(n):
13    dist_k_ = dist[k]
14    for i in range(n):
15      dist_i_ = dist[i]
16      dist_i_k_ = dist_i_[k]
17      if dist_i_k_ == INF: continue
18      for j, dist_k_j_ in enumerate(dist_k_):
19        if dist_i_[j] > dist_i_k_ + dist_k_j_:
20          dist_i_[j] = dist_i_k_ + dist_k_j_
21  return dist
22

24from typing import List, Tuple, Union
25
26'''Return min dist s.t. dist[a][b] -> a to b. / O(|n|^3)'''


[ドキュメント]
27def warshall_floyd(D: List[List[int]], INF: Union[int, float]=float('inf')) -> List[List[Union[int, float]]]:
28  n = len(D)
29  dist = [d[:] for d in D]
30  for k in range(n):
31    dist_k_ = dist[k]
32    for i in range(n):
33      dist_i_ = dist[i]
34      dist_i_k_ = dist_i_[k]
35      if dist_i_k_ == INF: continue
36      for j, dist_k_j_ in enumerate(dist_k_):
37        if dist_i_[j] > dist_i_k_ + dist_k_j_:
38          dist_i_[j] = dist_i_k_ + dist_k_j_
39  return dist
